required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Study to Evaluate the Drug-drug Interactions (DDIs) of DBPR108 With Warfarin Sodium, Digoxin, Probenecid in Healthy Subjects
clinical_study.official_title: A Three-part, Single-center, Open-label, Phase I Clinical Study to Evaluate the Drug-drug Interactions (DDIs) Between DBPR108 and Warfarin Sodium/Digoxin/Probenecid in Healthy Subjects

lead_sponsor.agency: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

clinical_study.source: CSPC ZhongQi Pharmaceutical Technology Co., Ltd.

brief_summary.textblock: This is a three-part, single-center, open-label phase I clinical study to characterize the DDIs potential of DBPR108 with Warfarin sodium, Digoxin, or Probenecid in healthy subjects. This study also aims to evaluate the safety and tolerability of DBPR108 in the presence of Warfarin sodium, Digoxin, or Probenecid.

detailed_description.textblock: DBPR108 is a potent dipeptidylpeptidase-4 inhibitor. This study will be run in three parts to characterize the DDIs potential of DBPR108 with the expected concomitant drugs (Warfarin sodium, Digoxin, Probenecid) in Healthy Subjects. Each part of this study consists of a screening period (Day -14 to Day -1), a baseline period (Day -1), a treatment period, and a follow-up visit period. Approximately 14 subjects will be enrolled in each part of this study.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events as assessed by CTCAE v5.0
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Number of participants with treatment-related adverse events will be assessed by CTCAE v5.0. The AEs will be summarized according to the system organ class (SOC) and preferred term (PT), including the number and percentage of participants who had AEs.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: ECG monitoring includes heart rate in bpm.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in 12-lead electrocardiogram (ECG) examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: ECG monitoring includes P-R, QT and QTc intervals in ms.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in physical examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Physical examination includes general conditions, skin, mucous membranes, head, neck, chest, abdomen, spine, limbs, nervous system, and lymphatic system.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring includes body temperature in degrees Celsius.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring includes respiratory rate and pulse in times per minute.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in vital signs examination will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Vital signs monitoring includes systolic blood pressure and diastolic blood pressure in mmHg.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test includes red blood cell count in 10^12/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test includes hemoglobin in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test includes hematocrit in L/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine blood test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Routine blood test includes white blood cell count, platelet, neutrophilic granulocyte count, lymphocyte count and monocyte count in 10^9 /L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes total protein and albumin in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes alanine aminotransferase, aspartate aminotransferase, alkaline phosphatase and glutamyltranspeptidase in U/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes total bilirubin and serum creatinine in umol/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in blood biochemistry test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Blood biochemistry test includes urea in mmol/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Routine urine test includes urobilinogen, glucose and protein in mg/dL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in routine urine test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Routine urine test includes pH.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Coagulation action test includes fibrinogen in g/L.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Coagulation action test includes prothrombin time, thrombin time and activated partial thromboplatin time in seconds.

secondary_outcome.measure: Clinically significant changes from baseline in coagulation function test will be recorded as AEs at each visit time point.
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Up to Day 33 from screening for part one, up to Day 22 from screening for part two, and up to Day 16 from screening for part three.
secondary_outcome.description: Coagulation action test includes international normalized ratio.

arm_group.arm_group_label: The DDI of DBPR108 and Warfarin Sodium Tablets
arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single dose of Warfarin sodium 5 mg on Day 1, then take DBPR108 100 mg once-daily on Day 15 through Day 26 and a single dose of Warfarin sodium 5 mg on Day 19.

arm_group.arm_group_label: The DDI of DBPR108 and Digoxin Tablets
arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single dose of Digoxin 0.25 mg on Day 1, then take DBPR108 100 mg once-daily on Day 6 through Day 15 and a single dose of Digoxin 0.25 mg on Day 10.

arm_group.arm_group_label: The DDI of DBPR108 and Probenecid Tablets
arm_group.description: Subjects will receive a single dose of DBPR108 100 mg on Day 1, then take Probenecid 500 mg twice-daily on Day 5 through Day 9 and a single dose of DBPR108 100 mg on Day 7.
